text: @NYGovCuomo Masks don't do anything and you and other liberal Governors and Mayors are absolute hypocrites.. not allowing CHURCH, arresting ppl for going to work, for protesting their right to WORK..but you encourage THIS? LIAR!! #coronavirus #riots #GerogeFloyd
